channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0507; 10:41AM; 1391 S Westwood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aO7SNf; #Westwood; 60 Firefighters took just 29 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames in a storage shed to the rear of a one-story row of commercial businesses, preventing fire spread to the common attic shared by an adjacent one-story restaurant and gallery. No injury. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC4 BC9 E19 E237 E261 E292 E37 E43 E59 E61 E69 RA62 RA63 RA837 RA92 SO1 T37 T61 T63 T92; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0507; 10:12AM; 1391 S Westwood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aO7SNf; #Westwood; PRELIM: Fire involving a storage shed to the rear of a one-story row of commercial businesses has led to heavy smoke (no current sign of flames) within the common attic shared by an adjacent restaurant and gallery.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC4 BC9 E19 E261 E292 E43 E59 E69 RA62 RA63 RA92 T61 T92; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN #PacificPalisades Structure Fire; INC#1397; 07:45PM; 17310 W Vereda De La Montura; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UbYvQm; Automobile on fire in the parking structure beneath an assisted living facility was extinguished in 34 minutes. One female patient sustained a fall injury while evacuating the building; she was transported by LAFD paramedics to a local hospital. Cause under investigation.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 BC18 BC9 E19 E23 E237 E269 E69 RA23 RA69 T37 T69; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

#PacificPalisades Structure Fire; INC#1397; 07:45PM; 17310 W Vereda De La Montura; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UbYvQm; First arriving companies report a convalescent home (3 residential stories over a parking structure) with light smoke showing due to one automobile on fire in parking structure. Firefighters are operating in offensive mode. ; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 BC9 E19 E23 E237 E269 E69 RA23 RA69 T37 T69; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN #BoyleHeights Pallet Fire; INC#1291; 06:36PM; 2900 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aGkHt9; Firefighters employed hose lines to extinguish the flames within 10 minutes; no exposures were affected and no injuries reported. Off-gassing batteries found onscene required LAFD Hazardous Materials specialists to assess and handle. Cause under investigation.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E17 E2 E202 E209 E25 E4 E9 EM1 RA17 RA25 RA809 SQ21 T2 T9; CH7; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

#BoyleHeights Pallet Fire; INC#1291; 06:36PM; 2900 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aGkHt9; Firefighters arrived onscene and reported a large lot with pallet storage and multiple vehicles, presenting with heavy smoke and exposing a concrete wall. Determined to be a large outside fire; offensive mode. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E17 E2 E202 E25 RA17 RA25 T2 T9; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

#Pacoima Train vs Pedestrian; INC#0608; 10:48AM; 11321 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QedrMO; Metrolink inbound passenger train reportedly struck one female pedestrian in the vicinity of San Fernando Road and Jessie Street, then continued a short distance before coming to an emergency stop. No apparent patient or fatality found. No reported injuries to train crew or passengers; LAFD personnel assisting with deboarding of train. Media inquiries can be directed to Metrolink or LAPD (incident 1822).; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E81 EM14 HR3 RA75 RA91 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

#HollywoodHills Hiker Rescue; INC#0457; 08:36AM; 1 Hollywood Sign; MAP: https://bit.ly/3whJCBQ; Firefighters are responding to an adult female hiker with an isolated lower extremity injury in a remote area of the Hollywood Hills. Rescuers on the ground and LAFD Air Ops are coordinating for a hoist operation and air transport to a local hospital. Nothing further.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E227 E82 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA82 RH114 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN #SunValley Structure Fire; INC#0424; 07:57AM; 7744 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UbzRzk; Initial arriving companies found an encampment on fire exposing a commercial building. Firefighters quickly extinguished the outside fire, then entered the building to check for extension. No extension to structure found. LAFD resources will remain on scene for overhaul. LAPD notified for traffic control. No reported injuries. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E260 E289 E298 E60 E77 E81 E89 EM14 RA889 RA89 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1245; 06:09PM; 11878 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W1Jmno; #BroadwayManchester; Firefighters made access to the vacant 50' x 50' one-story building and found fire inside and burning up into the attic. Crews advanced hose lines inside, while others ascended ladders to ventilate the roof. Ultimately, it took 32 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 RA864 SO1 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
